resources.string: This screen is the first screen when the user launches the app. It may show the user links to their library, the current playing song and also show their recently played songs and their playlists.

This screen will show all the top recently played songs and playlists to the user and will have a button that allows them to play the particular song or playlist. It will also have a link to the \'Now Playing\' activity.

This screen will show all the users songs and albums that they have on their device. Clicking either song or album will start playing that particular song or album. This screen will also contain a link to the \'Now Playing\' activity.

This screen will show all the users playlists that he/she has created. Clicking on each playlist will start playing that respective playlist. This screen will also contain a link to the \'Now Playing\' activty.

This screen will show the currently playing song\'s info like the name, playlist, album, album art, artist, year, etc. It will also have a progress bar showing the track\'s progress and the length of track. It will have buttons for Play which changes to pause and buttons for rewind and forward which when pressed for a longer time can fast rewind or fast forward. We can achieve the play/pause, rewind, forward functionality by using the MediaPlayer class provided by Android. The screen will also contain a link to the \'Library\' activity.
